choices.A: A minimum of two physical uplinks is required.
choices.B: vSphere Enterprise Plus licensing is required.
choices.D: Login to the ESXi Host with the Root account.
choices.C: The host is added to a vCenter Server.

discussion.content: Correct answer is B&C. You can create a vDS with 1 uplink. You also need VMware vSphere Enterprise Plus. You can't run vDS without vCenter.

AB is correct. Distributed Switch is available with Enterprise Plus
license.
Correct is B&C, a number minimum of required uplink is one and not two

questions.question_text: What is required to create a vSphere Distributed Switch? (Choose two.)

A VMware vSphere 6.x Administrator is creating an Alarm Action.
What are three configurable actions? (Choose three.)

comments.content: A&C are correct because it says two choices would make a Virtual Machine compatible, and B&D are not compatible with Fault Tolerance

discussion.content:
B&D https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/6.0/com.vmware.vsphere.avail.doc/GUID-C1749AD4-70E2-406C-864C-719F54BF1BC1.html

2TB+ VMDK : Fault Tolerance is not supported with a 2TB+ VMDK.
NIC passthrough. : This feature is not supported by Fault Tolerance so it must be turned off.

questions.question_text: Which two choices would make a Virtual Machine compatible when enabling Fault Tolerance? (Choose two.)

A vSphere Administrator notices that sometimes they receive poor network throughput for multiple port groups that reside on a vSwitch with multiple physical uplinks (vmnics). The configuration on the ESXi host is identical to other hosts that are working properly in the same cluster.
What should be done next?

choices.C: Alter the failover order of the vmnics until a bad vmnic is found.
choices.B: Add additional port groups to the vSwitch.
choices.D: Add additional resources to the virtual machines that are powered on.
choices.A: Restart Management agents in ESXi Using Direct Console User Interface (DCUI).

discussion.content: D is correct. Add additional resources to the virtual machines that are powered on.
Correct is C. The question speak about traffic bad on portgroups and not mangentment network.

questions.question_text: When managing search queries in vRealize Log Insight, what three actions can be performed? (Choose three.)

choices.C: Take a Snapshot of a Query
